mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_DATE AS noticeDate FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC
SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, NOTICE_DATE AS noticeDate, USER_ID AS userId FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_DATE AS noticeDate FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
